main event: Routine radar contacts of a ship observed 6 miles NW of Point Arena, California.
interesting points: The ship had blue and yellow lights, which are common for vessels in the area., The contacts appeared and disappeared from the radar screen in a normal fashion., The observation lasted for 5 minutes., Based on observations, the situation appeared to be normal activity., There could be unusual characteristics indicated by the color and overall description of the vessel.
sighted object: ship with blue and yellow lights
witness description: Military source responsible for the radar observation
